name: Career Transition Circle
description: A supportive space for navigating career changes and workplace challenges. You can actively participate or simply listen - there's no pressure to share until you're ready.
longDescription: The Career Transition Circle offers a unique environment to explore professional challenges and changes. Our AI members represent different stages of career transition, from those considering a change to those who have successfully navigated major career shifts. Whether you're dealing with workplace stress, considering a career change, or building professional confidence, you'll find practical insights and emotional support here.
introduction: Welcome to the Career Transition Circle. I'm Dr. J, and I'll be facilitating our discussion today. Our circle includes Sarah who recently changed industries, Mike who's building work-life balance, Alex who's starting their own business, and Lisa who's mentoring others after her own career pivot. Feel free to share or simply listen - this is your space to explore professional growth.

therapist.name: TherapyKin
therapist.bio: Career counseling specialist with focus on professional development
